body_html:
copy /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.h to /usr/local/include/math_functions.hpp, and it works.

sudo cp /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.h /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.hpp
body_text:
copy /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.h to /usr/local/include/math_functions.hpp, and it works.
sudo cp /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.h /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.hpp
body:
copy /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.h to /usr/local/include/math_functions.hpp, and it works.
```bash
sudo cp /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.h /usr/local/cuda/include/math_functions.hpp
```
